title: AstroNami Skin Idea (artists i need your help!!!!)
body:
The idea is that Nami is star constellation.  So she a celestial (or SEAlestial heehehe) being.  She would maintain her mermaid body shape and probably have a different head (dorsal?) fin.  The coloring would be a deep purple/black mostly, with nice white stars to help out fill in the shape and pronounce her facial features.  Her staff would feature a spinning moon on top of it.  

Her Q would be like a black hole.  

The w would be either a comet with trail or be the colors of the milkyway.  

The e would put asteroids around the champion.  

The R would be the colors and fluidity of a solar flare (not to be confused with leona.) 

If any artists want to take a shot at this;even just a recoloring of the current nami as a reference, please feel free to do so and post it here.  I'll update the post with it and be sure to give you the credit.  If you like the idea upvote it so more people see!.

replies.body: SPAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACE!  SPACE SPACE I LOVE SPACE!
I'm not sure how so many Portal references have been making it to the boards lately, but I am a huuuuge fan of this. Portal is one of my favorite games. :3

[Necessary](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HQoRXhS7vlU)

Yessss, love the reference! In fact, when I saw the title of the post, I thought of portal also! You know the Nami emote where some fish show up? I was thinking that those should instead be floating GLaDOS cores! (including the one rambling about space, obviously)

"Dad are you in space?"

"Yes son, now we can be a family again."
TL;DR i like the idea

This one in particular peaks my interest because it moves away from her being a different kind of fish. I especially love the idea of asteroids for her Tidecaller's Blessing.

Thank you.  And that was part of the reason for going space theme.  While all of the nami concept skins i've seen have been beautiful, they're all just variations of marine life.  I wanted to hopefully inspire something different for Nami where it's not just another creature of the sea, but something entirely different on its own.

Not the constellation Nami you wanted, but you inspired me to do Astronaut Nami.
https://imgur.com/CuAzbBI
Her Q is a black hole (they aren't very visually impressive tbh), her W is a rocket trail, her E is little rockets spinning, and her R is a wave of stars.
That was actually my original idea, but when i thought of doing it as a constellation instead i felt the "astronomy" joke just came across even better
